en.content: You approach the red-shrouded figures, expecting them at any moment to leap up and grab at you. There are three. Each has a label hanging from its toes:
You lift one corner of the shroud. Underneath, wrapped in tight bandages, is a thin but unmistakably human form. You are looking at three dead bodies. Embalmed dead bodies.

text.content: Make a Sanity roll. If you fail, lose 1D2 Sanity points.

zh.content: 你走近红布覆盖的人体，唯恐他们会一下子坐起来抓住你。人体有三具。每具人体的脚趾都系着一个标签：
你掀开苫布的一角。苫布下面毫无疑问是人体，枯瘦如柴，用绷带紧紧包裹。你正在看的是三具尸体。做过防腐的尸体。

text.content: 进行一次“理智”检定。如果你失败了，失去1D2点理智值。
